summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Hold Me Softly Style Balm is a soft-hold curl-enhancing styling cream that provides loose, soft definition without crunch.
details: DetailsBenefitsA soft hold cream to detangle and enhance curls, achieving a natural, effortless look. Lightweight feel.A soft hold curl cream that creates a soft effortless lookNo crunch curl cream with soft holdLaced with nourishing curl loving ingredientsCan be paired with another Curlsmith styler for stronger hold and defintionFeaturesWHO IS IT FOR? All curl types and texturesBEST FOR: Natural looking waves, curls, or coils.FORMAT: CreamHOLD: 1- Soft holdFEELS LIKE: Light silky creamColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643532How To UseApply to wet hair after your usual leave-in conditioner. Rake and smooth the product into wet hair. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua / Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Panthenol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carapa Guaianensis Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Ceteareth-20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Limonene, Linalool, Pinene, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes.*Organic Ingredient
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair after your usual leave-in conditioner. Rake and smooth the product into wet hair. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
